sentence.Network_en: While I struggle through life, she lands on her feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我挣扎过活的时候，她却运气亨通。

sentence.Network_en: He arrives in his biplane and crash lands it in a tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 他驾驶双翼飞机到达，在一棵树上紧急降落。

sentence.Network_en: With no lands of his own, he was no great matrimonial prize.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有自己的地产，不是结婚的上佳人选。

entry.tran: 土地；田地；（尤指）耕作用地，建筑用地
entry.def: Land is an area of ground, especially one that is used for a particular purpose such as farming or building.

example.ex: Good agricultural land is in short supply.
example.tran: 良田短缺。

example.ex: ...160 acres of land.
example.tran: 160英亩土地

entry.def: You can refer to an area of land which someone owns as their land or their lands.

example.ex: Their home is on his father's land...
example.tran: 他们的家建在他父亲拥有的地皮上。

example.ex: His lands were poorly farmed.
example.tran: 他的田地耕种不当。

entry.def: If you talk about the land, you mean farming and the way of life in farming areas, in contrast to life in the cities.

example.ex: Living off the land was hard enough at the best of times.
example.tran: 即使在年景最好的时候，务农为生也是相当艰辛的。

entry.def: Land is the part of the world that consists of ground, rather than sea or air.

example.ex: It isn't clear whether the plane went down over land or sea.
example.tran: 不清楚飞机是坠毁在陆地上还是海里。

example.ex: ...a stretch of sandy beach that was almost inaccessible from the land.
example.tran: 从陆路几乎难以到达的一片沙滩

entry.def: You can use land to refer to a country in a poetic or emotional way.

example.ex: Her husband's  body lies buried 2,000 miles away in a strange land.
example.tran: 她丈夫的遗体埋葬在两千英里外一个陌生的国度。

example.ex: ...blessed lands of sun and sea and olive trees.
example.tran: 有着阳光、海水和橄榄树的美丽国度

entry.def: When someone or something lands, they come down to the ground after moving through the air or falling.

example.ex: He was sent flying into the air and landed 20ft away...
example.tran: 他被抛到空中，落在20英尺外的地方。

example.ex: Three mortar shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
example.tran: 3枚迫击炮弹落在人群旁。

entry.def: When someone lands a plane, ship, or spacecraft, or when it lands, it arrives somewhere after a journey.

example.ex: The jet landed after a flight of just under three hours...
example.tran: 这架喷气式飞机在飞行了将近3小时后降落了。

example.ex: He landed his troops on the western shore...
example.tran: 他率部队在西岸登陆。

entry.def: To land goods somewhere means to unload them there at the end of a journey, especially by ship.

example.ex: The vessels will have to land their catch at designated ports.
example.tran: 船只必须在指定的港口把捕到的鱼卸下。

example.ex: ...a five-man gang which landed the huge shipment on the Cornwall coast.
example.tran: 在康沃尔海岸卸下这一大批货的五人团伙

entry.def: If you land in an unpleasant situation or place or if something lands you in it, something causes you to be in it.

example.ex: He landed in a psychiatric ward...
example.tran: 他被关进了精神病房。

example.ex: This is not the first time his exploits have landed him in trouble.
example.tran: 这已经不是他第一次因自己的冒险行为而惹上麻烦了。

entry.def: If someone or something lands you with a difficult situation, they cause you to have to deal with the difficulties involved.

example.ex: The other options simply complicate the situation and could land him with more expense.
example.tran: 其他办法只会使情况复杂化，而且可能给他带来更大花销。

entry.def: If something lands somewhere, it arrives there unexpectedly, often causing problems.

example.ex: Two days later the book had already landed on his desk...
example.tran: 两天后那本书竟然已经摆在了他的书桌上。

example.ex: This was the weekend that the war finally landed on their doorstep.
example.tran: 在这个周末，战火终于烧到了他们的家门口。

entry.def: If you land a fish, you succeed in catching it and getting it out of the water.

example.ex: One angler landed fish of 10 lb and 9 lb on the same day.
example.tran: 一名垂钓者在同一天分别钓到了10磅和9磅重的鱼。

entry.def: If you land something that is difficult to get and that many people want, you are successful in getting it.

example.ex: He landed a place on the graduate training scheme...
example.tran: 他在毕业生培训计划中赢得了一个位置。

example.ex: His flair with hair soon landed him a part-time job at his local barbers.
example.tran: 他的美发天赋令他很快在当地一家发廊找到一份兼职工作。

entry.def: If someone lands a blow or punch or if their blow or punch lands, they hit someone.

example.ex: De Leon landed a punch on the Italian's mouth after the end of the eleventh round...
example.tran: 11个回合过后，德莱昂一拳击在那个意大利人的嘴巴上。

example.ex: I could hear the blows landing as he appealed for help.
example.tran: 在他求救的同时我能听到拳头落下的声音。

auth_sentence.res_content: N'Diaye said lands affected by desertification can be reclaimed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: N'Diaye said lands affected by desertification can be reclaimed.

Sentence.sentence: He spent most of his days outdoors and had deep love for the wild lands.
